duties_responsibilities.duty: Support daily treasury operations and processing of treasury payments.
Maintain and upload positive pay file, review ACH debit transactions, and prepare daily liquidity and monthly treasury reports.
Communicate effectively with AP, banks, and business units for banking transactions.
Perform cash forecasting, variance analysis, and support the administration of the credit card program.
Manage short and long-term subsidiary funding needs and inter-company settlements.
Provide support on special projects or additional duties as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in accounting, finance, business, or similar field (Master's preferred)
